entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Colborne 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow mixed with rain at times heavy near midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
